Key Arguments: It reduces everyday freedom and could be abused by the government.
It threatens the right to free speech, which is a cornerstone of democracy.
There is skepticism about the government's ability to fairly determine what constitutes misinformation and disinformation.
Past government behavior during the pandemic has eroded trust in their actions.
Notable Quotes: This is government over-reach to which I object in the strongest terms.
